entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Lutselke
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
